SELECT a.id, a.menu_name menuName, a.menu_icon menuIcon, a.title_name titleName, a.menu_level menuLevel, a.menu_type menuType, a.menu_sys_type menuSysType, a.menu_parent_id parentId, a.menu_url menuUrl, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime FROM sys_eve_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user b ON a.creater = a.id WHERE 1=1
a.menu_name like '%${menuName}%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
